issue.title: diffusion files deleted
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

When you upload a file in the diffusion panel of a ressource for download or extract, this file is well uploaded on the server.
If you resave your diffusion without changing anything the file you just uploaded is deleted from the server.

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

I'm not sure I was supposed to me the assignee here...

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Thomas, as I understand this issue has been solved by you abd is available into your sandbox, right?
Thanks for your feedback,
